title: Master Tier (150LP Currently) Looking for Team
body:
I play Mid and Supp. add me yo

Please post here before adding me so I can scope out your team.

FOUND A TEAM THX

replies.body: Currently building a team with the org Alura Gaming, team fell apart recently and i'm building it 2 days prior to the tournaments.  We have 14 tournaments planned in the next 30 days. Give us a shot, added you ingame.

Yo Im building a team looking for a mid laner and a support add me if your interested were willing to join the oceanic open ladder its a diamond + team with a plat
Reply ASAP please
I'm B2 but you can ask me tips and advice anytime (Y)
I'm in Bronze VI all G you can add me <3
